mapper.sql: select topic_id, user_id, content, image_urls, topic_type, status, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from campus_topic
mapper.select: select c.comment_id, c.topic_id, c.user_id, c.parent_id, c.content, c.create_time, u.nick_name, CASE WHEN u.avatar IS NOT NULL AND u.avatar != '' THEN CONCAT(u.avatar, '?v=', u.update_time) ELSE u.avatar END as avatar, (select ru.nick_name from sys_user ru inner join campus_topic_comment rc on ru.user_id = rc.user_id where rc.comment_id = c.parent_id) as reply_to_nick_name from campus_topic_comment c left join sys_user u on u.user_id = c.user_id where c.topic_id = #{topicId} order by c.create_time asc
select * from campus_topic_like where topic_id = #{topicId} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into campus_topic_like(topic_id, user_id, create_time) values(#{topicId}, #{userId}, sysdate())
mapper.delete: delete from campus_topic_like where topic_id = #{topicId} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into campus_topic_comment(topic_id, user_id, parent_id, content, create_time) values(#{topicId}, #{userId}, #{parentId}, #{content}, #{createTime})
